fastTrackDescription.answer:
*My experiences: I worked as an office manager for a cleaning office company during 2006 to 2007. I found it interesting to see how the business worked. I needed extra income so I obtained and office building to clean in the evenings. Then I became a payroll clerk during 2007-2011. I need to increase my income so I obtained a second job cleaning the provincial courthouse on Spring Garden Rd. I learned about the duties of a sheriff so I took the course to become one. I have security experience and worked there for a few weeks for my training. Unfortunately the job was only a part-time job. I started cleaning houses in 2012. My first client was so amazing, I obtained her friend as a client from her referral. Most of my clients are from referrals and word of mouth. I currently have over 20 years of experiences cleaning. I absolutely love my job and my clients. My clients have become my friends and family. They often tell me I have a gift with cleaning and I help removing stress when they come home to a clean house. They can relax from a hard day’s work and not worry about the cleaning. The kids are happy with their room nice and tidy and the pets gets some hugs and kisses while I clean. 
*My customers are from all ages, with kids and pets to elders with disabilities. 
*My unique: I take pride of my work to ensure the clients are happy with the results. I build a solid relationship with the clients, I am dependable, bonded, and reliable. My clients call me the pet whisper. I show the pets with respect and gentleness. 
*I want this website to connect with marketplace/facebook advertising. To bring in clients when I have a spot available. But I also want to put the website to sleep or to state I am fully booked. 
*My service: I clean houses the way the clients wants. Every house/owner is different. I bring all the products and gear to do the job, I clean with environmentally/pet friendly products. I have a vacuum backpack cleaner with 3 filters to ensure the dust does not enter the house. I clean your house and take away your dirt. 
*Contact info: btqcleaningservices@gmail.com  cell: 902-220-1089 facebook:      https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61584047477031
*********
(HI THOMAS:  PLEASE FEEL FREE TO CLEAN UP ANY ERRORS OR TYPOS, MAKE IT SOUND PROFESSIONAL).

components.context: A herobanner that uses a slide show of images

props.subTitle: Welcome to BTQ Cleaning
props.title: Your Reliable & Friendly Cleaning Service
props.description: Experience a clean home that welcomes you back. We specialize in customized cleaning solutions with a personal touch.

components.context: A card to display key experiences, features, or highlights with image, text, and list items.

props.title: Why Choose Us?
props.description: With over 20 years of experience, we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional cleaning services that meet your unique needs. Our clients become our friends.
props.subTitle: Key Highlights

array.title: Personalized Cleaning Plans
array.description: We tailor our services to fit your specific requirements and preferences.

array.title: Eco-Friendly Products
array.description: We use environmentally friendly cleaning products that are safe for your family and pets.

array.title: Trustworthy & Dependable
array.description: We are bonded and insured, ensuring you receive reliable and trustworthy service.

array.title: Stress-Free Experience
array.description: Enjoy peace of mind knowing your home is clean, allowing you to relax after a long day.

array.title: Pet-Friendly Services
array.description: We treat your pets with kindness, ensuring they feel comfortable during our cleaning.

components.context: Provides a bulleted list of features/benefits

props.subTitle: Our Commitment to Quality
props.title: Discover the BTQ Difference
props.description: We are dedicated to providing exceptional cleaning services that enhance your living space. Here are our key benefits:

textArray.title: Customized Services
textArray.description: Every home is unique, and so are our cleaning solutions tailored to your needs.

textArray.title: Experienced Team
textArray.description: Our skilled team has over 20 years of cleaning experience, ensuring top-notch results.

textArray.title: Client Relationships
textArray.description: We build strong relationships with our clients, fostering trust and satisfaction.

textArray.title: Flexible Scheduling
textArray.description: We work around your schedule to provide convenient cleaning services.

array.title: Home Cleaning
array.description: Thorough cleaning services for every room in your home, ensuring a fresh and tidy atmosphere.

array.title: Deep Cleaning
array.description: In-depth cleaning that reaches every corner, perfect for seasonal refreshes or special occasions.

array.description: Comprehensive cleaning services to ensure a spotless transition to your new home.

props.title: Our Services
props.description: Explore our range of cleaning services designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations.

components.context: An interactive accordion component that displays a list of items with expandable descriptions. Supports pagination, intro text, and optional link button.

array.title: What areas do you serve?
array.description: We provide cleaning services across various neighborhoods. Please contact us for specific locations.

array.title: Do you bring your own supplies?
array.description: Yes, we bring all necessary cleaning supplies, including eco-friendly products and equipment.

array.title: How do I book a service?
array.description: Booking is simple! Contact us via email or phone to schedule your cleaning.

props.title: Frequently Asked Questions
props.description: Here are some common questions we receive from our clients.

props.subTitle: See Our Work
props.title: Transformations We Create
props.description: Browse through our gallery to see the beautiful clean spaces we have achieved for our clients.

testimonials.name: Sarah L.
testimonials.quote: BTQ Cleaning Services transformed my home! I couldn't be happier with the results.

testimonials.name: Mark T.
testimonials.quote: Dependable and thorough! They always exceed my expectations.

testimonials.name: Emily R.
testimonials.quote: I love coming home to a clean house. Thank you for your amazing service!

props.description: Hear what our satisfied clients have to say about our cleaning services.
